
# Studio SDK Examples

Showcase of Motion Studio SDK components.

Motion Studio allows for visual editing of animations. The SDK lets you load these animations or controls into your app.

## Loading a Studio Animation (Conceptual)

```jsx
// Hypothetical usage of Studio-generated assets
import { motion } from "motion/react"

export function StudioComponent() {
  return (
    <motion.div
      animate="studio-generated-animation-id"
      variants={{
        "studio-generated-animation-id": {
           // Complex keyframes generated by the tool
           opacity: [0, 1, 0.5, 1],
           scale: [1, 1.2, 0.9, 1]
        }
      }}
    />
  )
}
```

## References
- [Bezier Curve Editor](https://motion.dev/examples/react-bezier-curve-editor)
